body_html:
If anyone is having this issue, I solved this issue by making sure that shell always points to system python binary.
Some python utility tools such like pyenv causes confusion to bazel (dont' know how) and causes this particular error.
body_text:
If anyone is having this issue, I solved this issue by making sure that shell always points to system python binary.
Some python utility tools such like pyenv causes confusion to bazel (dont' know how) and causes this particular error.
body:
If anyone is having this issue, I solved this issue by making sure that shell always points to system python binary. 
Some python utility tools such like pyenv causes confusion to bazel (dont' know how) and causes this particular error.
